title: Diamond Cascade Stud Jhumka
features: These elegant earrings feature a cascade design, with individually bezel-set diamonds linked by delicate gold connectors. A modern take on the traditional jhumka, these earrings offer a sleek and sophisticated silhouette. Each diamond is meticulously placed to maximize brilliance and sparkle. The gold's Hyderabadi polish gives it a unique, lustrous shine.
occasions: Perfect for both formal occasions and daily wear. Suitable for weddings
or adding a touch of elegance to your everyday ensemble.
description: These Jhumkas blend modern design with timeless elegance. The use of high-quality diamonds and 22K gold ensures lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of regional artistry, setting these earrings apart from ordinary diamond jewelry.
